Detailed Description

Interface class that need to be implemented by user application.

Please see the following example for simple usage of TextWidget.

First you need write a class that public derived from Widget or some other UI component This class still should implement IPhoneStatusBarUI interface. For example: 

 class MyStatusBar : public IPhoneStautsbarUI,
 {
 public:
     virtual void init(gaia::core::ContextProxy* sysContext, gaia::core::ContextProxy* resContext)
     {
         mSysContext = new Context(*sysContext);
         mResContext = new Context(*resContext);
         mStatusBar = new MyStatusBarWidget(...);
         ...
     }
     virtual gaia::core::Widget* getWidget_StatusBar() const = 0;
     {
         return mStatusBar;
     }
 private:
     Context* mSysContext;
     Context* mResContext
 }

) [pure virtual]
